description: This file provides utility functions to check host reachability via ICMP ping and TCP fallback, exposing a public method for combined reachability check.

methods.name: bool _icmp_ping(host: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2)
methods.description: Performs an ICMP ping test to determine if the host is reachable.

methods.name: bool _tcp_fallback(host: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2)
methods.description: Attempts to connect to the host on port 80 as a fallback reachability check.

methods.name: Tuple[bool,str] check_reachability(host: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2)
methods.description: Public function that checks host reachability via ICMP ping first, then TCP fallback.

ctags.name: check_reachability
ctags.pattern: /^def check_reachability(host: str, timeout_seconds: int = 2) -> Tuple[bool, str]:$/
